I would say it is a very entertaining game. It might be a bit of a steep leaning curve for those who haven't played but when you get better it is rewarding. One gripe I have is that it doesn't deal with cheaters very well I have had a large number of cheaters in the past but it might be a bit better now.

I will make the review of this game as capacious as possible so that most of the players can understand it. In general, I really like the game, it has excellent physics, graphics, drawing of characters, a bunch of skins for weapons, everything is great! BUT ... players who use third-party software spoil the gameplay and the impression of the game, that's a big disadvantage. And so the game is very dynamic and interesting!
